name: LAB3_24046_R2
0:
”Alexa, open taco comfort solutions”
”What is the temperature”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taco comfort solutions
des:
The application will allow the user to control a LED, monitor ambient temperature and the status of a pushbutton. Ultimately for control of a demand hot water recirculation system. 
This uses a Microchip AVR128DB48 microcontroller and a Curiosity Nano Base.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
